name: 1080 Chase in Progress
description:
How long can you last in this high speed hot pursuit?

Score 200 to unlock No Damage High Impact mode for satisfying crash action!

Notes:

  • Arrows or A & D to move car
  • ESC key for in game menu
  • Catch fire at 70 damage
  • Turn too long and get rammed by police
  • Stay on the road or die!

Update 0.0.2:

  • 20% Chance to get a flat tire on impact with another car
  • Flat tire pulls slowly to the left or right depending on which tire blew
  • New spark effect and sounds for flat tire
  • Fixed fire direction on crash with grass
  • Other bug fixes

1080 Chase in Progress is filmed on location with the men and women of law enforcement. All suspects are innocent until proven guilty in a court of law.
